alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 2:07PM CST until January 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY... .A storm system will approach the region from the north, causing rain to change over to snow during the Saturday morning hours. Minor snow accumulations ranging from a dusting to four inches are possible. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between a dusting and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas. portions of central, east central, south central, southwest, and west central Missouri. The highest amounts are expected to occur over central Missouri. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM CST Saturday. rain will gradually change to snow from northwest to southeast over the advisory area late tonight and Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, particularly if wet or slushy roads tend to freeze Saturday evening as temperatures drop well below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
